articles.description: Marcus Derrickson tied a career-high with 27 points, on 11-of-13 shooting, for his eighth 20-plus point game this season and Georgetown beat Butler 87-83 on Tuesday night.
articles.headline: Georgetown snaps 4-game road losing streak, tops Butler

articles.description: Jeff Dowtin hits a trailing Jared Terrell who drills a 3-pointer for the Rams in the first half.
articles.headline: URI's Terrell knocks one down from deep

images.caption: Jeff Dowtin hits a trailing Jared Terrell who drills a 3-pointer for the Rams in the first half.
images.name: URI's Terrell knocks one down from deep

articles.description: Third-ranked Villanova will begin a difficult stretch of playing four of its next five games on the road with a trip to Providence Wednesday night at the Dunkin Donuts Center.
articles.headline: Freshmen send No. 3 Villanova surging into Providence

articles.description: After James Palmer Jr. knocks down the triple, the Cornhuskers bench look like they belong at the Radio City Music Hall as opposed to Lincoln, Nebraska.
articles.headline: Nebraska bench emulates Rockettes after 3-pointer

images.caption: After James Palmer Jr. knocks down the triple, the Cornhuskers bench look like they belong at the Radio City Music Hall as opposed to Lincoln, Nebraska.
images.name: Nebraska bench emulates Rockettes after 3-pointer

articles.description: Trae Young makes only one field goal but goes 9-for-9 from the free throw line and dishes the ball well as Oklahoma leads Texas Tech 37-36 at the half.
articles.headline: Young struggles in 1st half against Texas Tech

images.caption: Trae Young makes only one field goal but goes 9-for-9 from the free throw line and dishes the ball well as Oklahoma leads Texas Tech 37-36 at the half.
images.name: Young struggles in 1st half against Texas Tech
